tasks.task: Assembling and setting up a garden tower for growing plants.
subtasks: Carrying soil and compost to fill the garden tower.
Planting strawberries (including pineberry and Carolina varieties) in the tower.
Watering the tower according to the instructions (about three gallons, allowing it to percolate).
Rotating the tower to distribute the water and nutrients evenly.
Ensuring the tower is positioned for optimal sunlight (south-facing on a deck).

tasks.task: Managing food scraps within the garden tower.
subtasks: Regularly adding food scraps to the central compartment of the tower.

tasks.task: Caring for the strawberries in the garden tower.
subtasks: Monitoring water levels and adding as needed when rotating the tower.
Maintaining the health of strawberries through regular care (e.g., checking for pests or diseases).
Considering the use of an upgrade kit for mobility if needed (coasters or wheels).
